metadata.title: Lentiviral delivery of inducible Cre and dual sgRNA cassette

annotations.note: we engiof ARID1B. Specifically, perturbing ARID1B expands ventral radial glia neered a lentiviral vector to deliver 4-hydroxytamoxifen-inducible CRE recombinase and a dual single-guide RNA (sgRNA) cassette (Fig. 1a).
